channel.title: mcedit on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in mcedit on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Added building to Minecraft world
item.description: ##07:50 Tuesday 18 November 2014 JST## And by add, I mean using MCEdit, I injected an schematic of the Empire State Building (unfinished) by Avalanche_Ali I placed it in the middle of a plain at first, but then thought it would look weirder in a forest, so I put it there instead. Beautifully, without having really tried hard, the minecart track I had built went straight into the center of the building, aligned perfectly.
